alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 17 at 3:26PM AKDT until July 19 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKDT TUESDAY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect from 10 PM this evening to noon AKDT Tuesday. * LOCATION...Nome to Stebbins. * TIMING...10 PM this evening to noon AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur. * WAVE AND SURF...Surf will wash to the top of the beach.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
